name: deva
example_1: senānāyakā mahāmattā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti, kathañ'hi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā rājabhaṭaṃ pabbājessantī'ti.
meaning_1: leader of the army; general

name: deva
example_1: upajjhāyassa, deva, sīsaṃ chetabbaṃ, anussāvakassa jivhā uddharitabbā, gaṇassa upaḍḍhaphāsukā bhañjitabbā'ti.
meaning_1: should be cut off

name: deva
example_1: upajjhāyassa, deva, sīsaṃ chetabbaṃ, anussāvakassa jivhā uddharitabbā, gaṇassa upaḍḍhaphāsukā bhañjitabbāti.
meaning_1: half of the ribs

name: deva
example_1: upajjhāyassa, deva, sīsaṃ chetabbaṃ, anussāvakassa jivhā uddharitabbā, gaṇassa upaḍḍhaphāsukā bhañjitabbā'ti.
meaning_1: should be broken; should be destroyed

name: deva
example_1: aṅgulimālacoravatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: the story of Aṅgulimāla the criminal

name: deva
example_1: kārabhedakacoravatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of the escaped criminal; story of the criminal who had broken out of prison

name: deva
comment: vin3 not sure about construction, CPD: (etymol. doubtful)
example_1: manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti, abhayūvarā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā, na'y'ime labbhā kiñ'ci kātuṃ.
meaning_1: untouchable; inviolable; unrestrained by fear

name: deva
example_1: likhitakacoravatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of the wanted criminal; story of the criminal for whom a warrant had been written

name: deva
example_1: kasāhatavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: story of the man who had been whipped

name: deva
example_1: bhagavato etam'atthaṃ ārocesuṃ. na, bhikkhave, kasāhato katadaṇḍakammo pabbājetabbo. yo pabbājeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā'ti.
meaning_1: punished; having penalty

name: deva
example_1: lakkhaṇāhatavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of the one who had been branded; story of the man who had been branded

name: deva
example_1: bhagavato etam'atthaṃ ārocesuṃ. na, bhikkhave, lakkhaṇāhato katadaṇḍakammo pabbājetabbo. yo pabbājeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā'ti.
meaning_1: branded; who has been punished by hot iron

name: deva
example_1: iṇāyikavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of the one in debt; story of the debtor

name: deva
example_1: dāsavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of the slave

name: deva
example_1: kammārabhaṇḍuvatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of the shaven-headed blacksmith; story about one who carries blacksmith tools

name: deva
example_1: atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etam'atthaṃ ārocesuṃ. anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṅghaṃ apaloketuṃ bhaṇḍukammāyā'ti.
meaning_1: to obtains permission; to inform

name: deva
example_1: upālidārakavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: story of the boy Upāli

name: deva
example_1: ahivātakarogavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of the deadly and contagious disease; story about cholera

name: deva
example_1: tena kho pana samayena aññataraṃ kulaṃ ahivātakarogena kālaṅ'kataṃ hoti. tassa pitāputtakā sesā honti. te bhikkhūsu pabbajitvā ekato'va piṇḍāya caranti.
meaning_1: father and a little son

name: deva
example_1: atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etam'atthaṃ ārocesuṃ. na, bhikkhave, ūnapannarasavasso dārako pabbājetabbo. yo pabbājeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā'ti.
meaning_1: less than 15 years old

name: deva
example_1: bhikkhū apasādenti. te bhikkhūhi apasādiyamānā rodanti. atha kho āyasmato ānandassa etadahosi, bhagavatā paññattaṃ na ūnapannarasavasso dārako pabbājetabbo'ti.
meaning_1: being driven away; being dismissed

name: deva
example_1: atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etam'atthaṃ ārocesi. ussahanti pana te, ānanda, dārakā kāke uḍḍāpetun'ti? ussahanti, bhagavā'ti.
meaning_1: to scare away; to chase away

name: deva
example_1: kaṇṭakavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of Kaṇṭaka

name: deva
example_1: āhundarikavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of crowding; story about the obscure

name: deva
example_1: atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etam'atthaṃ ārocesuṃ. atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi, gacch'ānanda, avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya anupariveṇiyaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocehi, icchatāvuso bhagavā dakkhiṇāgiriṃ cārikaṃ pakkamituṃ.
meaning_1: go, Ānanda!; leave, Ānanda!

name: deva
example_1: tattha ca no gantabbaṃ bhavissati, nissayo ca gahetabbo bhavissati, ittaro ca vāso bhavissati, puna ca paccāgantabbaṃ bhavissati, puna ca nissayo gahetabbo bhavissati.
meaning_1: would come back; should return

name: deva
example_1: sampajānamusāvādo kho pan'āyasmanto antarāyiko dhammo vutto bhagavatā, tasmā saramānena bhikkhunā āpannena visuddh'āpekkhena santī āpatti āvikātabbā, āvikatā hi'ssa phāsu hoti.
meaning_1: indeed for him; certainly to that; truly to him

name: deva
example_1: sace amhākaṃ ācariyupajjhāyā gamissan'ti, mayam'pi gamissāma, no ce amhākaṃ ācariyupajjhāyā gamissan'ti, mayam'pi na gamissāma. lahucittakatā no, āvuso ānanda, paññāyissatī'ti.
meaning_1: appeared frickle

name: deva
example_1: nissayamuccanakakathā niṭṭhitā.
meaning_1: becoming free (from); being released (from)

name: deva
example_1: nissayamuccanakakathā niṭṭhitā.
meaning_1: discussion of release from formal support; case of release from dependency

name: deva
example_1: āpattiṃ na jānāti, anāpattiṃ na jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, ūnapañcavasso hoti, imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcah'aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
meaning_1: less than five years as a monk; fewer than five rains

name: deva
example_1: saddho hoti, hirimā hoti, ottappī hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, upaṭṭhitassati hoti, pañcavasso vā hoti atirekapañcavasso vā, imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
meaning_1: of five years of seniority; having five rains

name: deva
example_1: asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena, asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, pañcavasso vā hoti atirekapañcavasso vā, imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
meaning_1: of five or more years of seniority; of five rains or more

name: deva
example_1: abhayūvarabhāṇavāro niṭṭhito aṭṭhamo.
meaning_1: section for recitation on untouchables; recitation cycle about inviolables

name: deva
example_1: aṭṭhamabhāṇavāro.
meaning_1: eighth section for recitation

name: deva
example_1: rāhulavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of Rāhula; story about Rāhula

name: deva
example_1: atha kho rāhulamātā devī rāhulaṃ kumāraṃ etad'avoca, eso te, rāhula, pitā. gacchassu, dāyajjaṃ yācāhī'ti.
meaning_1: Rāhula’s mother

name: deva
example_1: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi sāmaṇerapabbajjan'ti.
meaning_1: going forth as a novice monk; ordination of a novice

name: deva
example_1: puttapemaṃ, bhante, chaviṃ chindati, chaviṃ chetvā cammaṃ chindati, cammaṃ chetvā maṃsaṃ chindati, maṃsaṃ chetvā nhāruṃ chindati, nhāruṃ chetvā aṭṭhiṃ chindati, aṭṭhiṃ chetvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati.
meaning_1: affection for a son; love for a child

name: deva
example_1: sikkhāpadakathā niṭṭhitā.
meaning_1: discussion of training rules

name: deva
example_1: daṇḍakammavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of punishment; story of penalty

name: deva
example_1: bhagavato etam'atthaṃ ārocesuṃ. na, bhikkhave, mukhadvāriko āhāro āvaraṇaṃ kātabbo. yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā'ti.
meaning_1: consuming through the mouth

name: deva
example_1: anāpucchāvaraṇavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of the prohibition made without having taken leave; story of the obstruction without asking permission

name: deva
example_1: apalāḷanavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: case of luring away

name: deva
example_1: kaṇṭakasāmaṇeravatthu
meaning_1: case of Kaṇṭaka the novice

name: deva
example_1: paṇḍakavatthu
meaning_1: case of the paṇḍakas; story of asexuals

name: deva
example_1: so bhikkhūhi apasādito mahante mahante moḷigalle sāmaṇere upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeti, etha, maṃ āvuso dūsethāti. sāmaṇerā apasādenti, nassa, paṇḍaka, vinassa, paṇḍaka, ko tayā attho'ti.
meaning_1: name of the novice

name: deva
example_1: assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ hatthibhaṇḍānaṃ assabhaṇḍānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
meaning_1: elephant-trainer; elephant keeper

name: deva
example_1: assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ hatthibhaṇḍānaṃ assabhaṇḍānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
meaning_1: groom; stableman; horse keeper

name: deva
example_1: theyyasaṃvāsakavatthu
meaning_1: case of one who dishonestly in the community of monks; story about one who claiming status to which he has no right

name: deva
example_1: atthatakathinānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, pañca kappissanti, anāmantacāro, asamādānacāro, gaṇabhojanaṃ, yāvadatthacīvaraṃ, yo ca tattha cīvaruppādo so n'esaṃ bhavissatī'ti.
meaning_1: the amount of robe-cloth one wants; as many robes as one needs; as much cloth as one needs

name: deva
example_1: atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitu'kāmo amaritu'kāmo sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo.
meaning_1: not to die

name: deva
construction:
na > a + pati + √thī + na
na + patitthīna
example_1: cakkhunā kho pan'eva rūpaṃ disvā amanāpaṃ na maṅku hoti apatitthīnacitto adīnamānaso abyāpannacetaso.
meaning_1: not resistant; not opposed

name: deva
example_1: atthatakathinānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, pañca kappissanti, anāmantacāro, asamādānacāro, gaṇabhojanaṃ, yāvadatthacīvaraṃ, yo ca tattha cīvaruppādo so n'esaṃ bhavissatī'ti.
meaning_1: whatever robe-cloth is given

name: deva
example_1: atthatakathinānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, imāni pañca kappissanti. evañ'ca pana, bhikkhave, kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ.
meaning_1: should be spread; can be laid out

name: deva
example_1: na ullikhitamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na dhovanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na cīvaravicāraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: simply by taking the measure; merely by measuring; if only a measure is taken

name: deva
example_1: na ullikhitamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na dhovanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na cīvaravicāraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na chedanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: simply by cleaning; merely by washing; if it is only washed

name: deva
example_1: na ullikhitamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na dhovanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na cīvaravicāraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na chedanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: simply by arranging robe-cloth; merely by arranging the robe-cloth; if the clth is only layed out

name: deva
example_1: na ullikhitamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na dhovanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na cīvaravicāraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na chedanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: simply by cutting; merely by cutting; only if it is cut

name: deva
example_1: na cīvaravicāraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na chedanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na bandhanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na ovaṭṭiyakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: simply by attaching; merely by joining; if pieces are only attached

name: deva
example_1: na ovaṭṭiyakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na kaṇḍusakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na daḷhīkammakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: simply by folding a seam; merely by making a seam; if only a seam is made

name: deva
example_1: na ovaṭṭiyakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na kaṇḍusakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na daḷhīkammakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: simply by marking; merely by making a mark; if it is only marked

name: deva
example_1: na bandhanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na ovaṭṭiyakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na kaṇḍusakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: strip of cloth used to mark the kaṭhina robe

name: deva
example_1: na kaṇḍusakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na daḷhīkammakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na anuvātakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: simply by strengthening; merely by strengthening; if it is only stiffened

name: deva
example_1: na anuvātakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na paribhaṇḍakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na ovaddheyyakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: merely by adding a side boarder; simply by attaching a vertical boarder; if only a side boarder is added

name: deva
example_1: na anuvātakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na paribhaṇḍakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na ovaddheyyakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: simply by attaching a horizontal boarder; merely by adding a top or bottom boarder; if only a horizontal boarder is added

name: deva
example_1: na paribhaṇḍakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na ovaddheyyakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na kambalamaddanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: simply by patching; merely by adding a patch; if only a patch is added

name: deva
example_1: na ovaddheyyakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na kambalamaddanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na nimittakatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: simply by dying; merely by washing a cloth in dye

name: deva
example_1: na kambalamaddanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na nimittakatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na parikathākatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: an indication (that) has been made; something pointed out

name: deva
example_1: na nimittakatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na parikathākatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na kukkukatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: hinting; making a suggestion

name: deva
example_1: na aññatra antaravāsakena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na aññatra pañcakena vā atirekapañcakena vā tadah'eva sañchinnena samaṇḍalīkatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: five or more; at least five; in a group of more then five

name: deva
example_1: na aññatra pañcakena vā atirekapañcakena vā tadah'eva sañchinnena samaṇḍalīkatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na aññatra puggalassa atthārā atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: hemmed; with the border around

name: deva
example_1: na aññatra puggalassa atthārā atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, sammā c'eva atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, tañ'ce nissīmaṭṭho anumodati, evam'pi anatthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ.
meaning_1: outside a boundary; standing outside

name: deva
example_1: ahatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, ahatakappena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, pilotikāya atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, paṃsukūlena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, pāpaṇikena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, animittakatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: brand new

name: deva
example_1: paṃsukūlena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, pāpaṇikena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, animittakatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, aparikathākatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, akukkukatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: unmarked; without a marking

name: deva
example_1: akukkukatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, asannidhikatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, anissaggiyena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, kappakatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ
meaning_1: is not stored; has been received recently

name: deva
example_1: aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā kathinassa ubbhārāya, pakkaman'antikā, niṭṭhān'antikā, sanniṭṭhān'antikā, nāsanantikā, savan'antikā, āsāvacchedikā, sīm'ātikkantikā, sahubbhārā'ti.
meaning_1: ending with departing; concluding with leaving

name: deva
example_1: aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā kathinassa ubbhārāya, pakkaman'antikā, niṭṭhān'antikā, sanniṭṭhān'antikā, nāsanantikā, savan'antikā, āsāvacchedikā, sīm'ātikkantikā, sahubbhārā'ti.
meaning_1: concluded with the end; finished with the last day (of robe season)

name: deva
example_1: aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā kathinassa ubbhārāya, pakkaman'antikā, niṭṭhān'antikā, sanniṭṭhān'antikā, nāsan'antikā, savan'antikā, āsāvacchedikā, sīm'ātikkantikā, sahubbhārā'ti.
meaning_1: concluding with the lost; ending with the destruction (of the robe-cloth)

name: deva
example_1: aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā kathinassa ubbhārāya, pakkaman'antikā, niṭṭhān'antikā, sanniṭṭhān'antikā, nāsan'antikā, savan'antikā, āsāvacchedikā, sīm'ātikkantikā, sahubbhārā'ti.
meaning_1: concluding with the hearing; ending with the information (about end of the robe season)

name: deva
example_1: aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā kathinassa ubbhārāya, pakkaman'antikā, niṭṭhān'antikā, sanniṭṭhān'antikā, nāsan'antikā, savan'antikā, āsāvacchedikā, sīm'ātikkantikā, sahubbhārā'ti.
meaning_1: transgressing; overstepping the bounds

name: deva
example_1: aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā kathinassa ubbhārāya, pakkaman'antikā, niṭṭhān'antikā, sanniṭṭhān'antikā, nāsan'antikā, savan'antikā, āsāvacchedikā, sīm'ātikkantikā, sahubbhārā'ti.
meaning_1: being outside the boundary; going beyond the (monastery) zone

name: deva
example_1: aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā kathinassa ubbhārāya, pakkaman'antikā, niṭṭhān'antikā, sanniṭṭhān'antikā, nāsan'antikā, savan'antikā, āsāvacchedikā, sīm'ātikkantikā, sahubbhārā'ti.
meaning_1: ending together; finishing in common

name: deva
example_1: aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā kathinassa ubbhārāya, pakkaman'antikā, niṭṭhān'antikā, sanniṭṭhān'antikā, nāsan'antikā, savan'antikā, āsāvacchedikā, sīm'ātikkantikā, saubbhārā'ti.
meaning_1: ending together; finishing with (another)

name: deva
example_1: ādāyasattakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: group of seven with "takes"

name: deva
example_1: bhikkhu atthatakathino katacīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati, na paccessan'ti. tassa bhikkhuno pakkamanantiko kathin'uddhāro.
meaning_1: finished robe; completed robe; made robe

name: deva
example_1: bhikkhu atthatakathino cīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati. tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti, idh'ev'imaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan'ti. so taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti.
meaning_1: passed beyond the boundary; gone outside the zone; outside the limit (of the monastery)

name: deva
example_1: bhikkhu atthatakathino cīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati. tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti, n'ev'imaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan'ti. tassa bhikkhuno sanniṭṭhānantiko kathin'uddhāro.
meaning_1: not even this

name: deva
example_1: samādāyasattakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: group of seven on “with”

name: deva
example_1: ādāyachakkaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: group of six on “takes”

name: deva
example_1: bhikkhu atthatakathino vippakatacīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati. tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti, idh'ev'imaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan'ti.
meaning_1: unfinished robe-cloth

name: deva
example_1: samādāyachakkaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: group of six on “with”

name: deva
example_1: ādāyapannarasakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: group of fifteen on "taking"

name: deva
example_1: samādāyapannarasak'ādi niṭṭhitā.
meaning_1: group of fifteen on “with”

name: deva
example_1: vippakatasamādāyapannarasakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: group of fifteen on “with an unfinished”; group of fifteen on “with an incorrect”

name: deva
example_1: ādāyabhāṇavāro.
meaning_1: section for recitation on “takes”

name: deva
example_1: anāsādoḷasakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: set of twelve on “not as expected”

name: deva
example_1: karaṇīyadoḷasakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: group of twelve on “business”

name: deva
example_1: phāsuvihārapañcakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: group of five on “meditation going well”

name: deva
example_1: bhikkhu atthatakathino phāsuvihāriko cīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati, amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi, tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati
meaning_1: pleasantly abiding; living in comfort; whose meditation is going well

name: deva
example_1: palibodhāpalibodhakathā niṭṭhitā.
meaning_1: discussion on obstacles and removal of obstacles

name: deva
example_1: idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vasati vā tasmiṃ āvāse, sāpekkho vā pakkamati paccessan'ti. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, āvāsapalibodho hoti. kathañ'ca, bhikkhave, cīvarapalibodho hoti?
meaning_1: monastery obstacle (for completing the kathīna)

name: deva
example_1: idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ akataṃ vā hoti vippakataṃ vā, cīvar'āsā vā anupacchinnā. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cīvarapalibodho hoti.
meaning_1: robe cloth obstacle (for completing the kathīna); (kathīna) obstruction based on robe-cloth

name: deva
example_1: apavilānā navettha, phāsu pañcavidhā tahiṃ, palibodh'āpalibodhā, uddānaṃ nayato katan'ti.
meaning_1: obstacles and removal of obstacles

name: deva
example_1: imamhi khandhake vatthū doḷasakapeyyālamukhāni ekasataṃ aṭṭhārasa.
meaning_1: groups of twelve with repetition; repeated sections of twelve items

name: deva
example_1: cīvarakkhandhako aṭṭhamo.
meaning_1: chapter on robes; robe-cloth chapter

name: deva
example_1: jīvakavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: account of Jīvaka; story of Jīvaka

name: deva
example_1: satta ca pāsādasahassāni satta ca pāsādasatāni satta ca pāsāde, satta ca kūṭāgārasahassāni satta ca kūṭ'āgārasatāni satta ca kūṭāgārāni
meaning_1: hundred mansions; palaces numbering one hundred

name: deva
example_1: satta ca ārāmasahassāni satta ca ārāmasatāni satta ca ārāme, satta ca pokkharaṇīsahassāni satta ca pokkharaṇīsatāni satta ca pokkharaṇiyo
meaning_1: thousand monasteries; parks numbering one thousand

name: deva
example_1: satta ca kūṭāgārasahassāni satta ca kūṭ'āgārasatāni satta ca kūṭāgārāni, satta ca ārāmasahassāni satta ca ārāmasatāni satta ca ārāme, satta ca pokkharaṇīsahassāni satta ca pokkharaṇīsatāni satta ca pokkharaṇiyo
meaning_1: hundred monasteries; parks numbering one hundred

name: deva
example_1: satta ca ārāmasahassāni satta ca ārāmasatāni satta ca ārāme, satta ca pokkharaṇīsahassāni satta ca pokkharaṇīsatāni satta ca pokkharaṇiyo, ambapāliñ'ca gaṇikaṃ abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ
meaning_1: thousand ponds; pools numbering one thousand; thousand lotus pools

name: deva
example_1: satta ca ārāmasahassāni satta ca ārāmasatāni satta ca ārāme, satta ca pokkharaṇīsahassāni satta ca pokkharaṇīsatāni satta ca pokkharaṇiyo
meaning_1: hundred ponds; pools numbering one hundred; hundred lotus pools

name: deva
example_1: atha kho jīvakassa komārabhaccassa etadahosi, imāni kho rājakulāni na sukarāni asippena upajīvituṃ. yaṃnūn'āhaṃ sippaṃ sikkheyyan'ti.
meaning_1: without a skill; without a craft

name: deva
example_1: atha kho jīvakassa komārabhaccassa etadahosi, imāni kho rājakulāni na sukarāni asippena upajīvituṃ. yaṃnūn'āhaṃ sippaṃ sikkheyyan'ti.
meaning_1: to make a livelihood; to sustain oneself; to take care of oneself

name: deva
example_1: ahaṃ kho, ācariya, bahuñ'ca gaṇhāmi lahuñca gaṇhāmi suṭṭhu ca upadhāremi, gahitañca me na sammussati, satta ca me vassāni adhīyantassa, na'y'imassa sippassa anto paññāyati.
meaning_1: studying; learning it by heart

name: deva
example_1: seṭṭhibhariyāvatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: account of the wealthy merchant’s wife; story of the wealthy wife; instance with the rich wife

name: deva
example_1: atha kho jīvako komārabhacco taṃ pasataṃ sappiṃ nānābhesajjehi nippacitvā seṭṭhibhariyaṃ mañcake uttānaṃ nipātetvā natthuto adāsi.
meaning_1: having cooked (medicine); having brewed

name: deva
example_1: atha kho seṭṭhibhariyā jīvakassa komārabhaccassa vikāraṃ sallakkhetvā jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ etad'avoca, kissa tvaṃ, ācariya, vimanosī'ti?
meaning_1: you are upset; you're displeased; you're unhappy; you're downcast

name: deva
example_1: idaṃ me, deva, paṭhamakammaṃ soḷasasahassāni dāso ca dāsī ca assaratho ca. paṭiggaṇhātu me devo posāvanikan'ti.
meaning_1: first job; first action; first deed

name: deva
example_1: bimbisārarājavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: account of King Bimbisāra; story of Bimbisāra the king

name: deva
example_1: tassa, bhante, āyasmato bhagandalābādho, ākāsagotto vejjo satthakammaṃ karotī'ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavā, ananucchavikaṃ, bhikkhave, tassa moghapurisassa, ananulomikaṃ, appatirūpaṃ, assāmaṇakaṃ, akappiyaṃ, akaraṇīyaṃ.
meaning_1: hemorrhoid; fistula; condition of swelling and bleeding of the inner thighs

name: deva
example_1: atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro arogo samāno pañca itthisatāni sabb'ālaṅkāraṃ bhūsāpetvā omuñcāpetvā puñjaṃ kārāpetvā jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ etad'avoca
meaning_1: all jewllery; all ornaments

name: deva
example_1: atha kho, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa evam'assa, sakkā kho me ayaṃ surāpipāsitā pānīyena vā vinetuṃ dadhimaṇḍakena vā vinetuṃ bhaṭṭhaloṇikāya.
meaning_1: best part; cream; essence; fine extract

name: deva
example_1: idh'ev'āhaṃ veḷuvagāmake vassaṃ upagacchāmī'ti. evaṃ, bhante'ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā samantā vesāliyā yathāmittaṃ yathāsandiṭṭhaṃ yathāsambhattaṃ vassaṃ upagacchuṃ.
meaning_1: enters; starts; undertakes (rains retreat)

name: deva
example_1: n'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekabandhanam'pi samanupassāmi evaṃdāruṇaṃ evaṃkaṭukaṃ evaṃantarāyakaraṃ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya, yatha'y'idaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayabandhanaṃ vā tiracchānayonibandhanaṃ vā'ti.
meaning_1: one bondage; single imprisonment; one confinement

name: deva
example_1: na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikapavāraṇādānena pavāretabbaṃ, aññatra avuṭṭhitāya parisāya. na ca, bhikkhave, appavāraṇāya pavāretabbaṃ, aññatra saṅghasāmaggiyāti.
meaning_1: passed-on invitation that has expired; passed-on invitation of a probationer

name: deva
construction:
na > a + pa + vāre + anā
na > a + pavāraṇā
example_1: na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikapavāraṇādānena pavāretabbaṃ, aññatra avuṭṭhitāya parisāya. na ca, bhikkhave, appavāraṇāya pavāretabbaṃ, aññatra saṅghasāmaggiyāti.
meaning_1: non-invitation day; no invitation; no offer
grammar: fem, abstr, act, from na pavāreti

name: deva
example_1: dvevācikādipavāraṇā niṭṭhitā.
meaning_1: invitation ceremony by means of two statements

name: deva
example_1: bāḷhataraṃ savarabhayaṃ ahosi. bhikkhū n'āsakkhiṃsu dvevācikaṃ pavāretuṃ.
meaning_1: stronger; more intense; greater

name: deva
example_1: idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahu pavāraṇāya bhikkhūhi dhammaṃ bhaṇantehi … suttantikehi suttantaṃ saṅgāyantehi… vinayadharehi vinayaṃ vinicchinantehi
meaning_1: reciting; chanting

name: deva
example_1: idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahu pavāraṇāya bhikkhūhi dhammaṃ bhaṇantehi … suttantikehi suttantaṃ saṅgāyantehi… vinayadharehi vinayaṃ vinicchinantehi… dhammakathikehi dhammaṃ sākacchantehi
meaning_1: investigating; exploring

name: deva
example_1: idha pana, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahu pavāraṇāya bhikkhūhi dhammaṃ bhaṇantehi … suttantikehi suttantaṃ saṅgāyantehi… vinayadharehi vinayaṃ vinicchinantehi… dhammakathikehi dhammaṃ sākacchantehi… bhikkhūhi kalahaṃ karontehi yebhuyyena ratti khepitā hoti.
meaning_1: discussing; talking together (with)

name: deva
example_1: pavāraṇāṭhapanaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: cancellation of the invitation; setting aside the invitation

name: deva
example_1: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū okāsaṃ kārāpiyamānā na icchanti okāsaṃ kātuṃ. bhagavato etam'atthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
meaning_1: being made to do; being made to perform

name: deva
construction:
na > a + ṭhape + ita
na > a + ṭhapita
example_1: asammatāya, bhikkhave, sīmāya aṭṭhapitāya, yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati, yā tassa vā gāmassa gāmasīmā, nigamassa vā nigamasīmā
meaning_1: not suspended; not cancelled; not set aside; not put aside

name: deva
example_1: so ce evaṃ vadeyya, cattāri pārājikāni, terasa saṅghādisesā, ayaṃ sīlavipatti, thull'accayaṃ, pācittiyaṃ, pāṭidesanīyaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ, dubbhāsitaṃ, ayaṃ ācāravipatti, micchādiṭṭhi, antaggāhikādiṭṭhi, ayaṃ diṭṭhivipattī'ti
meaning_1: extreme view; oppinion that holds an ultimate end; belief leading to a definite conclusion

name: deva
example_1: thullaccayavatthuk'ādi niṭṭhitā.
meaning_1: based on serious offense; grounded on grave transgression

name: deva
example_1: vatthuṭhapan'ādi niṭṭhitā.
meaning_1: setting aside an offense; suspending of a matter

name: deva
example_1: bhaṇḍanakārakavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: matter of argumentative; story of quarrelsome

name: deva
construction:
na > a + saṃ + vi + √dhā > (da)h + ita
na > a + saṃvihita
example_1: te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā asaṃvihitā taṃ āvāsaṃ āgacchanti, tehi, bhikkhave, āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi āsanaṃ paññapetabbaṃ
meaning_1: without notice; not ordered; not arranged

name: deva
example_1: paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ, pānīyena paripucchitabbā, tesaṃ vikkhitvā nissīmaṃ gantvā pavāretabbaṃ, pavāretvā vattabbā, pavāritā kho mayaṃ, āvuso, yathāyasmantā maññanti tathā karontū'ti.
meaning_1: having distracted; having disturbed; having confused

name: deva
construction:
na > an + anuyoga + khama
na > an + anuyogakkhama
example_1: tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi pavāriyamāne gilāno gilānassa pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, so evam'assa vacanīyo, āyasmantā kho gilānā. gilāno ca ananuyogakkhamo vutto bhagavatā.
meaning_1: unable to stand scrutiny; not fit for examination

name: deva
example_1: evaṃ mayaṃ imamhā phāsuvihārā paribāhirā bhavissāmā'ti, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tehi bhikkhūhi pavāraṇāsaṅgahaṃ kātuṃ.
meaning_1: agreement or postponement about the invitation ceremony

name: deva
example_1: pavārentā paṇāmañ'ca, kammaṃ gilānañātakā, rājā corā ca dhuttā ca, bhikkhupaccatthikā tathā.
meaning_1: inviting; requesting

name: deva
example_1: āvāsikā cātuddasa, liṅgasaṃvāsakā ubho, gantabbaṃ na nisinnāya, chandadānapavāraṇā.
meaning_1: giving consent and invitation

name: deva
example_1: savarehi khepitā megho, antarā ca pavāraṇā, na icchanti puramhākaṃ, aṭṭhapitā ca bhikkhuno.
meaning_1: an aboriginal tribe; a savage; a member of the Dravidian people living in southern India

name: deva
example_1: cammakkhandhako pañcamo.
meaning_1: chapter on skins

name: deva
example_1: soṇakoḷivisavatthu niṭṭhitaṃ.
meaning_1: story of Soṇa Koḷivisa

name: deva
example_1: tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro asītiyā gāmasahassesu issariy'ādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāreti.
meaning_1: one thousand villages

name: deva
example_1: atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro tāni asīti gāmikasahassāni diṭṭhadhammike atthe anusāsitvā uyyojesi
meaning_1: one thousand villagers; villages chiefs

name: deva
example_1: atha kho soṇassa koḷivisassa mātāpitaro soṇaṃ koḷivisaṃ etadavocuṃ, rājā te, tāta soṇa, pāde dakkhitu'kāmo. mā kho tvaṃ, tāta soṇa, yena rājā tena pāde abhippasāreyyāsi.
meaning_1: wishing to see; wanting to see

name: deva
example_1: tumhe khvattha, bhaṇe, mayā diṭṭhadhammike atthe anusāsitā, gacchatha, taṃ bhagavantaṃ payirupāsatha, so no bhagavā samparāyike atthe anusāsissatīti.
meaning_1: taught; instructed; ordered; advised

name: deva
example_1: seyyathāpi nāma phālo divasaṃsantatto udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati padhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati, evameva so guḷo udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati padhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.
meaning_1: smoulders; smokes; emits smoke; fumes

name: deva
example_1: alattha kho soṇo koḷiviso bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ. acir'upasampanno ca pan'āyasmā soṇo sītavane viharati.
meaning_1: soon after ordaining; not long after ordained as a monastic

name: deva
example_1: atha kho āyasmā soṇo aparena samayena vīriyasamataṃ adhiṭṭhāsi, indriyānañ'ca samataṃ paṭivijjhi, tattha ca nimittaṃ aggahesi.
meaning_1: balance of energy; evenness of effort

name: deva
example_1: yo so, bhante, bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇ'āsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaññojano samma'd'aññā vimutto, so chaṭṭhānāni adhimutto hoti, nekkhamm'ādhimutto hoti
meaning_1: who has cut the bond to existence; who has worn away the bonds of being; who has exhausted the fetter of existence; epithet of an arahant

name: deva
example_1: yo so, bhante, bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇ'āsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaññojano samma'd'aññā vimutto, so chaṭṭhānāni adhimutto hoti
meaning_1: six things; six positions

name: deva
example_1: khīṇ'āsavo, bhante, bhikkhu, vusitavā, katakaraṇīyo, karaṇīyamattānaṃ asamanupassanto katassa vā paṭicayaṃ khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā nekkhamm'ādhimutto hoti
meaning_1: something to be done in oneself; anything should be done in himself

name: deva
example_1: iṭṭhā dhammā aniṭṭhā ca, na pavedhenti tādino, ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ vippamuttaṃ, vayañ'c'ass'ānupassatī'ti.
meaning_1: trembles; agitates; stresses

name: deva
example_1: diguṇ'ādiupāhanapaṭikkhepo niṭṭhito.
meaning_1: prohibition against sandals with double-layered soles, etc.

name: deva
example_1: ath'āhaṃ bhante ekapalāsikaṃ ce upāhanaṃ pariharissāmi, tassa me bhavissan'ti vattāro soṇo koḷiviso asītisakaṭavāhe hiraññaṃ ohāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito, sattahatthikañ'ca anīkaṃ.
meaning_1: eighty cardloads

name: deva
example_1: atha kho so purāṇakulaputto khīṇakolañño āyasmatā upālinā anuyuñjiyamāno etam'atthaṃ ārocesi. āyasmā upāli bhikkhūnaṃ etam'atthaṃ ārocesi.
meaning_1: son from a good family; young man from a respectable family; young gentleman

name: deva
example_1: tiracchānagatavatthu
meaning_1: account of animals; story of animals; instance of animals

name: deva
construction:
na > a + viruḷhi + dhamma
na > a + aviruḷhidhamma
example_1: atha kho so nāgo aviruḷhidhammo kirāhaṃ imasmiṃ dhammavinaye'ti dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno vissaraṃ katvā pakkāmi.
meaning_1: unable to progress; not liable to grow
meaning_lit: not of the nature to sprout

name: deva
example_1: na upāhan'ārūḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmī'ti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
meaning_1: wearing; put on

name: deva
example_1: oṇirakkho nāma āhaṭaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gopento pañcamāsakaṃ vā atirekapañcamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ theyyacitto āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. phandāpeti, āpatti thull'accayassa.
meaning_1: treasure; property; entrusted wares
commentary: (VINa) oṇiṃ rakkhatī'ti oṇirakkho. yo parena attano vasanaṭṭhāne ābhataṃ bhaṇḍaṃ idaṃ

name: deva
construction:
sa + saṃ + √ñā + ā + ī
sasaññā + ī
example_1: anāpatti sasaññissa, vissāsaggāhe, tāvakālike, petapariggahe, tiracchānagatapariggahe, paṃsukūlasaññissa, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
meaning_1: perceiving as his own; understanding as one's own
commentary: (VINa) evaṃ vatthuvasena ca cittavasena ca āpattibhedaṃ dassetvā idāni anāpattibhedaṃ dassento anāpatti sasaññissā'ti'ādim'āha.

name: deva
example_1: haneyyuṃ vā'ti hatthena vā pādena vā kasāya vā vettena vā aḍḍhadaṇḍakena vā chejjāya vā haneyyuṃ.
meaning_1: staff; rod

name: deva
example_1: anāpatti sasaññissa, vissāsaggāhe, tāvakālike, petapariggahe, tiracchānagatapariggahe, paṃsukūlasaññissa, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
meaning_1: something from a rubbish heap; something discarded; rubbish

name: deva
example_1: bhūmaṭṭhaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikkhittaṃ hoti nikhātaṃ paṭicchannaṃ. bhūmaṭṭhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharissāmīti theyyacitto dutiyaṃ vā pariyesati kudālaṃ vā piṭakaṃ vā pariyesati gacchati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
meaning_1: under earth; underground
commentary: (VINa) bhūmaṭṭhaṃ thalaṭṭhan'ti'ādinā nayena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā, bhūmaṭṭhaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikkhittaṃ hotī'ti'ādinā nayena tassa vibhaṅgaṃ āha.

name: deva
example_1: ādiyeyyā'ti ādiyeyya hareyya avahareyya iriyāpathaṃ vikopeyya ṭhānā cāveyya saṅketaṃ vītināmeyya.
meaning_1: movement; motion
commentary: (VINa) iriyāpathaṃ vikopeyyā'ti sahabhaṇḍahārakaṃ nessāmī'ti paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ saṅkāmeti, āpatti thull'accayassa. dutiyaṃ pādaṃ saṅkāmeti, āpatti pārājikassa.

name: deva
example_1: ācikkhanā nāma puṭṭho bhaṇati, evaṃ marassu. yo evaṃ marati so dhanaṃ vā labhati yasaṃ vā labhati saggaṃ vā gacchatī'ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
meaning_1: telling; informing; announcing

name: deva
example_1: anāpatti sasaññissa, vissāsaggāhe, tāvakālike, petapariggahe, tiracchānagatapariggahe, paṃsukūlasaññissa, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
meaning_1: border; edge

name: deva
example_1: ārogy'atthāya moceti, sukh'atthāya moceti, bhesajj'atthāya moceti, dānatthāya moceti, puññatthāya moceti, yaññ'atthāya moceti, saggatthāya moceti, bīj'atthāya moceti
meaning_1: for the purpose of ease; for the sake of comfort

name: deva
example_1: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evam'assa vacanīyo, m'āyasmā samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi
meaning_1: thus it should be; it should be in this way

name: deva
example_1: yadā ca sajātiyā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, yadā ca vissaṭṭho niddaṃ okkamati, ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā nāgassa sabhāvapātukammāya.
meaning_1: normal appearance; original form; show (their) true nature

name: deva
example_1: mātughātakavatthu
meaning_1: account of matricide; story of one who has killed their mother; instance of a person who has murdered one's own mother

name: deva
example_1: pitughātakavatthu
meaning_1: account of patricide; story of one who has killed their father; instance of a person who has murdered one's own father

name: deva
example_1: bhikkhū bhagavato etam'atthaṃ ārocesuṃ. pitughātako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo'ti.
meaning_1: father-killer; patricide; one who has killed one's own father

name: deva
example_1: arahantaghātakavatthu
meaning_1: account of a murderer of an awakened being; story of one who murdered an Arahant; instance of the killer of an Arahant

name: deva
example_1: addasaṃsu kho te palāyitvā pabbajitā te core vadhāya oniyyamāne, disvāna evam'āhaṃsu, sādhu kho mayaṃ palāyimhā, sacā ca mayaṃ gayheyyāma, mayam'pi evam'eva haññeyyāmāti.
meaning_1: being led away; being carried away; seized

name: deva
example_1: sāvatthiyā rājabhaṭā nikkhamitvā ekacce core aggahesuṃ, ekacce corā palāyiṃsu. ye te palāyiṃsu te bhikkhūsu pabbajiṃsu, ye te gahitā te vadhāya oniyyanti.
meaning_1: is led away; is carried away; is seized

name: deva
example_1: bhikkhunīdūsakavatthu
meaning_1: account of a nun rapist; story of the rapist of a nun; instance of one who assaulted a nun

name: deva
example_1: āmasanā, parāmasanā, omasanā, ummasanā, olaṅghanā, ullaṅghanā, ākaḍḍhanā, patikaḍḍhanā, abhiniggaṇhanā, abhinippīḷanā, gahaṇaṃ, chupanaṃ.
meaning_1: stroking in a downwards direction

name: deva
example_1: āmasanā, parāmasanā, omasanā, ummasanā, olaṅghanā, ullaṅghanā, ākaḍḍhanā, patikaḍḍhanā, abhiniggaṇhanā, abhinippīḷanā, gahaṇaṃ, chupanaṃ.
meaning_1: touching; stroking; rubbing; caressing
